name: Naruto: Clash of Ninja Revolution
description:
"Clash of Ninja Revolution is the best in its series, and hands-down the
top fighter on Wii this year." - IGN

NARUTO: Clash of Ninja Revolution is an original Wii game exclusive to
the North American Market. Based on the hit series currently airing on
Cartoon Network, this first game for the Wii released in North America
includes characters that have never been featured in the Clash of Ninja
game series. The game follows the storyline of the television series and
takes advantage of the Wii Remote™ in fast-paced ninja action for up to
four players in nine different gameplay modes. This next generation
NARUTO title will also include all new character animations, new
interactive environments and special mini-games created exclusively for
the Wii Remote™.
